CH1 UP:     00110101 01011001 10011010 01000000 00000101
CH1 DOWN:   00110101 01011001 10011010 01100000 00100101
CH1 STOP:   00110101 01011001 10011010 00100000 01000101

CH1 LEFT:   00110101 01011001 10011010 01100010 00100111
CH1 RIGHT:  00110101 01011001 10011010 00010010 01100111

CH2 PAIR:   00000101 01011001 10011010 00000000 10000101

CH2 RIGHT:  00000101 01011001 10011010 00010010 00010111

CH3 RIGHT:  00001101 01011001 10011010 00010010 01010111

Home Remote

CH1 UP:     00011101 10000101 10011010 01000000 00101101
CH1 DOWN:   00011101 10000101 10011010 01100000 00011101
CH1 STOP:   00011101 10000101 10011010 00100000 01101101
CH1 PAIR:   00011101 10000101 10011010 00000000 11001101
CH1 LEFT:   00011101 10000101 10011010 01100010 00011111
CH1 RIGHT:  00011101 10000101 10011010 00010010 01011111

CH2 UP:     00111101 10000101 10011010 01000000 01101101
CH2 DOWN:   00111101 10000101 10011010 01100000 01011101
CH2 STOP:   00111101 10000101 10011010 00100000 00011101
CH2 PAIR:   00111101 10000101 10011010 00000000 10101101
CH2 LEFT:   00111101 10000101 10011010 01100010 01011111
CH2 RIGHT:  00111101 10000101 10011010 00010010 00111111

CH3 UP:     00000001 10000101 10011010 01000000 00011101
CH3 DOWN:   00000001 10000101 10011010 01100000 00111101
CH3 STOP:   00000001 10000101 10011010 00100000 01011101
CH3 PAIR:   00000001 10000101 10011010 00000000 11101101
CH3 LEFT:   00000001 10000101 10011010 01100010 00111111
CH3 RIGHT:  00000001 10000101 10011010 00010010 01111111

CH4 UP:     00000011 10000101 10011010 01000000 01011101
CH4 DOWN:   00000011 10000101 10011010 01100000 01111101
CH4 STOP:   00000011 10000101 10011010 00100000 00111101
CH4 PAIR:   00000011 10000101 10011010 00000000 10011101
CH4 LEFT:   00000011 10000101 10011010 01100010 01111111
CH4 RIGHT:  00000011 10000101 10011010 00010010 00000000

CH5 UP:     00000011 10000101 10011010 01000000 00111101
CH5 DOWN:   00000011 10000101 10011010 01100000 00000011
CH5 STOP:   00000011 10000101 10011010 00100000 01111101
CH5 PAIR:   00000011 10000101 10011010 00000000 11011101

CH5 RIGHT:  00000011 10000101 10011010 00010010 01000000

CH6 PAIR:   00100011 10000101 10011010 00000000 10111101

CH6 RIGHT:  00100011 10000101 10011010 00010010 00100000


4 Way Remote

CH1 UP:     00000101 00101101 11101010 01000000 01110101
CH1 DOWN:   00000101 00101101 11101010 01100000 01001101
CH1 STOP:   00000101 00101101 11101010 00100000 00001101
CH1 PAIR:   00000101 00101101 11101010 00000000 10110101

CH2 UP:     00000101 00101101 11101010 01000000 00110101
CH2 DOWN:   00000101 00101101 11101010 01100000 00001101
CH2 STOP:   00000101 00101101 11101010 00100000 01110101
CH2 PAIR:   00000101 00101101 11101010 00000000 11010101

CH3 UP:     00000001 00101101 11101010 01000000 01010101
CH3 DOWN:   00000001 00101101 11101010 01100000 01110101
CH3 STOP:   00000001 00101101 11101010 00100000 00110101
CH3 PAIR:   00000001 00101101 11101010 00000000 10010101

CH4 UP:     00111001 00101101 11101010 01000000 00010101
CH4 DOWN:   00111001 00101101 11101010 01100000 00110101
CH4 STOP:   00111001 00101101 11101010 00100000 01010101
CH4 PAIR:   00111001 00101101 11101010 00000000 11100101
